downloadPage.Download_6: Select a platform to download the application. After the VG.Poker app is downloaded to your device, open the file (it maybe saved to your Download folder), select 'Install' to continue. lf a security warning flashes up, select Yes' or Run'. To launch the VG.Poker app, just select the app icon once it has finished installing.
downloadPage.Download_8: It is totally free to become a VG.Poker player. Open the app and select 'Google' or 'Account' to sign up with your Google account or your mobile number. downloadPage.Download_10: Before getting stuck into the action, you can claim our free bonus. And then you may want to select 'Cashier' to see the range of payment options available to you. Simply use the tabs or icons to find your preferred poker games – we’ve made things as clear as we could!
